translations.text: Until you visit the graveyards.<sup foot_note=197808>1</sup>
No! You are going to know.
Then, no! You are going to know.
No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...<sup foot_note=197809>1</sup>
You will surely see the Hellfire.
Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.<sup foot_note=197810>1</sup>
Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.<sup foot_note=197811>1</sup>
